messages.message: Hi automate team. I was going through a federal demo and working with some Arabic documents. For analysis, things worked well once I enabled non-latin and advanced mode for the reader. I don't see this in automated. How to I accomplish the same for an app?
@Nithin any feedback from the Saudi Arabia apps we built?

We have couple of apps built for Arabic lang. which worked well. Please review them

*Arabic Driver License:* https://aihub.instabase.com/build/d34ed0c1-44db-43d5-b638-22afbe3dad5d
*Arabic Bank Statement:* https://aihub.instabase.com/build/10fa6593-268b-49af-994d-97bca265083e
Those required a custom build? We should update Automated to allow the reader to use non-latin characters if that is not available already. How did you make this work @Nithin?

@Jason - Not sure we enabled Non-Latin in Reader config. But our project settings currently does not have Non-Latin enabled. cc @Sahil to confirm.

When I tested it now, we need to enable Non-Latin to get it working, so your feedback to auto enable non-latin makesense.
@hannah this is what we should get set up for build/automate. Is that on the roadmap anywhere?
Automatic makes more sense to me as well. Not sure how much this changes for performance or cost.
@Jason this is already supported in build
Can you please view project digitization settings? once you make the selection in build it will be set for the app
Automatic selection is nice to have and not on the roadmap
